# ziti_posture_check_mac_addresses (Resource)

Ziti Posture check Resource, Type: MAC Address check

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ziti_posture_check_mac_addresses" "test_posture_check_mac_addresses" {
  name            = "test_mac_addresses"
  role_attributes = ["test"]
  mac_addresses   = ["00:1a:2b:3c:4d:5e"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mac_addresses` (List of String) MAC address list
- `name` (String) Name of the Posture Check

### Optional

- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
- `tags` (Map of String) Posture Check Tags

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier
- `last_updated` (String) Last Updated Time

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# mac addresses posture check can be imported by specifying the identifier.
terraform import ziti_posture_check_mac_addresses.test_posture_check_mac_addresses <ID>
```
